  • Constructor Details

    • ManageStaffUI

      public ManageStaffUI()
      Constructs a ManageStaffUI with an initialized Scanner for handling user input.

  • Method Details

    • manageUserMenu

      public void manageUserMenu(AdministratorController administratorController, IDisplayableView<Staff> staffView, IListDisplayableView<Staff> staffListView)
      Displays the main menu for managing hospital staff. Allows the administrator to view, add, update, and remove staff, or go back to the previous menu.
      Parameters:
      administratorController - The controller used to manage staff-related operations.
      staffView - The view interface for displaying a single staff member's information.
      staffListView - The view interface for displaying a list of staff members.

    • filterStaff

      public void filterStaff(AdministratorController administratorController, IListDisplayableView<Staff> staffListView)
      Provides filtering options for viewing hospital staff by role, gender, or age. Prompts the user to select a filtering criterion and then displays the filtered list of staff.
      Parameters:
      administratorController - The controller used to manage staff-related actions, including filtering.
      staffListView - The view interface for displaying the filtered list of staff members.
